### 线性代数
* 推荐教材:
 * [Linear Algebra and Its Applications (5th Edition) by David C. Lay](https://www.amazon.com/Linear-Algebra-  Its-Applications-5th/dp/032198238X)
 * [Introduction to Linear Algebra, Fifth Edition (2016) by Gilbert Strang](http://math.mit.edu/~gs/linearalgebra/)
